sentences.en: a disappointing speech that skirted around all the main issues
sentences.cn: 回避所有主要问题的令人失望的演说

sentences.en: a skirt with an elasticated waist
From her tiny waist a crinolined skirt cascaded in three deep tiers.
sentences.cn: 裙架撑起的三层大裥裙从她的纤腰上款款垂下。

sentences.en: Gather the skirt at the waist.
Isabel had on a simple jumper and skirt.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔穿着素净的针织套衫和裙子。

sentences.en: My wedding dress has a very full skirt.
sentences.cn: 我结婚礼服的裙摆很宽松。

sentences.en: She idly pulled at a loose thread on her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她无聊地扯着裙子上一根松掉的线头。

sentences.en: She smoothed the creases out of her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她把裙子上的皱褶弄平。

sentences.en: She turned with a swish of her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她转身时裙摆也跟着旋转飘起。

sentences.en: She was wearing a white ruffled blouse and a blue velvet skirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件有花边的白色上衣和一条蓝色天鹅绒裙子。

sentences.en: She wore a thick tartan skirt and a red cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一条厚厚的格子呢裙和一件红色羊绒衫。

sentences.en: She wore a white blouse and a plain black skirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着白衬衣和纯黑的裙子。

sentences.en: She's wearing a slinky black mini-skirt.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一条紧身的黑色迷你裙。

sentences.en: That skirt of hers is positively indecent.
sentences.cn: 她的那条裙子太暴露了。

sentences.en: The thin wind snatched at her skirt.
sentences.cn: 一阵小风呼地吹起了她的裙子。

sentences.en: This skirt needs some new elastic in the waist.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子需要换一根松紧腰带。

sentences.en: This woman wore seamed nylons and kept smoothing her skirt.
sentences.cn: 这个女士穿着长筒尼龙缝袜，不停地把裙子弄平整。

words.tran_cn: 避开；绕过…的边缘；沿边缘走（skirt的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 裙子，边缘，（连衣裙、外衣等的）下摆，（车辆或机器基座的）挡板
trans.tran_en: a piece of outer clothing worn by women and girls, which hangs down from the waist like the bottom part of a dress

to avoid talking about an important subject, especially because it is difficult or embarrassing – used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 位于…的边缘，沿…的边缘走，绕开，避开
